channel.title: docker on Hehaitao.vip
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Hehaitao.vip

item.title: docker学习笔记
item.description: 1.安装软件 docker安装mysql docker pull mysql docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql -v ~/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql: docker exec -i -t 3bb555abd8ab /bin/bash docker安装redis docker pull redis docker run -d --name redis -p 6379:6379 redis docker exec -i -t redis /bin/bash docker安装nginx docker pull nginx docker安装YAPI docker安装gogs 2.生产环境
